results.content: Clear. Lots of details that otherwise are lost
results.content_html: Clear. Lots of details that otherwise are lost

results.content: I highly recommend this course. The instructor explains the topics very well and when a student has a question he responds very quickly. There are probably courses out there the that are more detailed or go further into some specific topics of Gatsby but it is important to get the basic understanding quickly and this course delivers on that and then some more too. I absolutely recommend this course as the first stop on the way to become a good Gatsby developer.
